@graph.title: Mesoscopic systems : fundamentals and applications
@graph.abstract: Introduction -- Quantum versus classical physics -- Quantization -- Dimensionality -- Junctions -- 3D quantum systems -- 2D quantum systems -- 1D quantum systems -- 0D quantum systems -- Transport properties -- Optical properties -- Magnetic properties -- Properties of macroscopic quantum states -- Future prospects : FDM solution of Schr(c)œdinger equations. Effective-mass approximated equations. Boundary conditions for an interface. Hydrogenic envelope function in 3D and 2D. Transition probability of optical processes. Eigenvalue problem for a linear electric potential. Calculation of conductivity tensor in a magnetic field. Landau state in z-representation. Micromagnetism of stripe domain. Physics underlying Josephson junctions
